Part Of: Arabic documents (https://iiif.durham.ac.uk/manifests/trifle/collection/32150/t2c9k41zd486)
Summary: Muhammad Ahmad b. `Abd Allah, al Mahdi. â€¦ Ratib sayyidina al-imam Muhammad ibn `Abd Allah al-Mahdi al-muntazar [etc.]. 1st impression. al-Khartum. A note on p. 48 states that the contents were copied and corrected from a copy in the possession of al-Mudaththir Ibrahim [al-Hajjaz] (Brockelmann, Supp. II, 896).
Published: 27 Ramadan 1302 [11 July 1885]
